channel.title: Coding
channel.description:
I've changed some tunetexts to construction texts, and if I right click on the construction text I can chose out built and close.
but how to make that when I click on built it will make an object on the ground and that it will do the building emote, what code do I need??
see this vid for what I mean :
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Iyk0z1-77ls

item.title: Coding
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

i mean cancel with close… ;p

on the ground…U know what I mean , see the vid …

Help please

Read full topic

item.title: Coding
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

What do you mean with close? And object on the ground? Does it just appear in the sky?

And you would have to find the building emote ID and use a code which runs that emote.

Read full topic
